document_data.name: Eight
document_data.mainbody:
'''Eight''' was a [[goblin]] child that lived in the [[Shattered Sanctum]], a fortress of the [[Cult of the Absolute]].

{{Quote|Stupid, dead bastard. Give him a good kickin' â€“ he deserves it!|Eight, pointing towards the dead [[Flaming Fist]] soldier that killed his parents.}}
document_data.Description: Eight wore a [[leather]] [[helmet]] and a crude [[cuirass]] that was fastened by a [[rope]].
document_data.Personality: The goblin was very aggressive despite being so young.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Eight's was made an orphan when his parents were murdered by a soldier of the [[Flaming Fist]] during his camp's raid of the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn. The young goblin claimed to have killed the man, and then took out their rage on the corpse of the alleged murderer. Eight claimed that they were better off without their parents anyway.
